meanings.definition: Goods or wreckage that is lying on the sea bed and can be claimed by the owner.
meanings.sent1: The divers discovered ancient lagans on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen hauled up a heavy lagan filled with treasures.
meanings.sent3: The pirate captain joked about finding lagans full of gold doubloons.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like hidden lagans waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The sunken ship was a treasure trove of lagans waiting to be salvaged.

meanings.sent1: The fishermen repaired their torn lagans before heading out to sea.
meanings.sent2: The lagan was cast into the water to catch fish.
meanings.sent3: The old fisherman's lucky lagan always brought in a big catch.
meanings.sent4: The shimmering lagan danced in the water, ready to ensnare its prey.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the lagan made it perfect for catching fish.

meanings.definition: A type of legal claim on property.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer filed a lagan on behalf of her client to protect the land.
meanings.sent2: The siblings disputed the lagan over their inheritance.
meanings.sent3: The eccentric millionaire made a lagan on the moon as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The lagan on the ancient artifact sparked a heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The lagan on the property title ensured ownership rights.
